query.statement:
SELECT A.MANDT AS MANDT ,A.ITEM AS ITEM ,B.MATNR AS MATNR ,B.GUBUN AS GUBUN ,REPLACE(A.STYM, '000000', '') AS STYM ,CASE WHEN B.WAERK IN ('KRW', 'JPY') THEN B.SVAMT * 100 ELSE B.SVAMT END AS MATNR_SVAMT ,B.WAERK AS MATNR_WAERK ,CASE WHEN B.SPEC12 IN (' ', '') THEN '' ELSE B.SPEC12 END AS SPEC12 ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.SPEC3FR IN ('0000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.SPEC3FR END AS INT) AS SPEC3FR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.SPEC3TO IN ('0000', '') THEN '9999' ELSE B.SPEC3TO END AS INT) AS SPEC3TO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.SPEC5FR IN ('000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.SPEC5FR END AS INT) AS SPEC5FR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.SPEC5TO IN ('000', '') THEN '999' ELSE B.SPEC5TO END AS INT) AS SPEC5TO ,CASE WHEN B.ECSF IN (' ', '') THEN '' ELSE B.ECSF END AS ECSF ,CASE WHEN B.ETM IN (' ', '') THEN '' ELSE B.ETM END AS ETM ,CASE WHEN B.MATKL IN (' ', '') THEN '' ELSE B.MATKL END AS MATKL --신규추가 ,CASE WHEN B.AUSE IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.AUSE END AS AUSE ,CASE WHEN B.ACAPA IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.ACAPA END AS ACAPA ,CASE WHEN B.AOPEN IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.AOPEN END AS AOPEN ,CASE WHEN B.ADRV IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.ADRV END AS ADRV ,CASE WHEN B.ASPC IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.ASPC END AS ASPC ,CASE WHEN B.ACD1 IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.ACD1 END AS ACD1 ,CASE WHEN B.ACD2 IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.ACD2 END AS ACD2 ,CASE WHEN B.BWM IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.BWM END AS BWM ,CASE WHEN B.BMOPB IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.BMOPB END AS BMOPB ,CASE WHEN B.BCDM IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.BCDM END AS BCDM ,CASE WHEN B.BHR IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.BHR END AS BHR ,CASE WHEN B.CJM1 IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.CJM1 END AS CJM1 ,CASE WHEN B.CJM1M IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.CJM1M END AS CJM1M ,CASE WHEN B.CJM1FR IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.CJM1FR END AS CJM1FR ,CASE WHEN B.CHD1 IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.CHD1 END AS CHD1 ,CASE WHEN B.CHS1 IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.CHS1 END AS CHS1 ,CASE WHEN B.DEPH IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.DEPH END AS DEPH ,CASE WHEN B.ETMM IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.ETMM END AS ETMM ,CASE WHEN B.ERPD IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.ERPD END AS ERPD ,CASE WHEN B.ERPW IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.ERPW END AS ERPW ,CASE WHEN B.ERPR IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.ERPR END AS ERPR ,CASE WHEN B.ECRL IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.ECRL END AS ECRL ,CASE WHEN B.ECGV IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.ECGV END AS ECGV ,CASE WHEN B.ECWRL IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.ECWRL END AS ECWRL ,CASE WHEN B.ECWW IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.ECWW END AS ECWW ,CASE WHEN B.ECWSF IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.ECWSF END AS ECWSF ,CASE WHEN B.DSV1 IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.DSV1 END AS DSV1 ,CASE WHEN B.DCCTV IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.DCCTV END AS DCCTV ,CASE WHEN B.DCAIR IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.DCAIR END AS DCAIR ,CASE WHEN B.EHM IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.EHM END AS EHM ,CASE WHEN B.ASTDA IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.ASTDA END AS ASTDA ,CASE WHEN B.DUOPB IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.DUOPB END AS DUOPB ,CASE WHEN B.AINOV IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.AINOV END AS AINOV ,CASE WHEN B.ASTD IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.ASTD END AS ASTD ,CASE WHEN B.DELD IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.DELD END AS DELD ,CASE WHEN B.DSV2 IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.DSV2 END AS DSV2 ,CASE WHEN B.DHSBT IN ('','') THEN '' ELSE B.DHSBT END AS DHSBT ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.AFQFR IN ( '000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.AFQFR END AS INT) AS AFQFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ASTQFR IN ( '000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.ASTQFR END AS INT) AS ASTQFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.BFTHFR IN ( '000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.BFTHFR END AS INT) AS BFTHFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.CJM1QFR IN ( '000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.CJM1QFR END AS INT) AS CJM1QFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.CHD1QFR IN ( '000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.CHD1QFR END AS INT) AS CHD1QFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.CHS1QFR IN ( '000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.CHS1QFR END AS INT) AS CHS1QFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.DEPHTQFR IN ( '000000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.DEPHTQFR END AS INT) AS DEPHTQFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.EHOFR IN ( '000000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.EHOFR END AS INT) AS EHOFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.EHTRHFR IN ( '000000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.EHTRHFR END AS INT) AS EHTRHFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.EHPFR IN ( '000000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.EHPFR END AS INT) AS EHPFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.EHHFR IN ( '000000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.EHHFR END AS INT) AS EHHFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.EHVFR IN ( '000000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.EHVFR END AS INT) AS EHVFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ECCAFR IN ( '0000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.ECCAFR END AS INT) AS ECCAFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ECCBFR IN ( '0000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.ECCBFR END AS INT) AS ECCBFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ECCHFR IN ( '0000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.ECCHFR END AS INT) AS ECCHFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ECAAFR IN ( '0000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.ECAAFR END AS INT) AS ECAAFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ECBBFR IN ( '0000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.ECBBFR END AS INT) AS ECBBFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ECEEFR IN ( '0000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.ECEEFR END AS INT) AS ECEEFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ECJJFR IN ( '0000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.ECJJFR END AS INT) AS ECJJFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ECHHFR IN ( '0000', '') THEN '0' ELSE B.ECHHFR END AS INT) AS ECHHFR ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.AFQTO IN ( '000', '') THEN '999' ELSE B.AFQTO END AS INT) AS AFQTO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ASTQTO IN ( '000', '') THEN '999' ELSE B.ASTQTO END AS INT) AS ASTQTO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.BFTHTO IN ( '000', '') THEN '999' ELSE B.BFTHTO END AS INT) AS BFTHTO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.CJM1QTO IN ( '000', '') THEN '999' ELSE B.CJM1QTO END AS INT) AS CJM1QTO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.CHD1QTO IN ( '000', '') THEN '999' ELSE B.CHD1QTO END AS INT) AS CHD1QTO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.CHS1QTO IN ( '000', '') THEN '999' ELSE B.CHS1QTO END AS INT) AS CHS1QTO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.DEPHTQTO IN ( '000000', '') THEN '999999' ELSE B.DEPHTQTO END AS INT) AS DEPHTQTO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.EHOTO IN ( '000000', '') THEN '999999' ELSE B.EHOTO END AS INT) AS EHOTO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.EHTRHTO IN ( '000000', '') THEN '999999' ELSE B.EHTRHTO END AS INT) AS EHTRHTO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.EHPTO IN ( '000000', '') THEN '999999' ELSE B.EHPTO END AS INT) AS EHPTO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.EHHTO IN ( '000000', '') THEN '999999' ELSE B.EHHTO END AS INT) AS EHHTO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.EHVTO IN ( '000000', '') THEN '999999' ELSE B.EHVTO END AS INT) AS EHVTO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ECCATO IN ( '0000', '') THEN '9999' ELSE B.ECCATO END AS INT) AS ECCATO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ECCBTO IN ( '0000', '') THEN '9999' ELSE B.ECCBTO END AS INT) AS ECCBTO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ECCHTO IN ( '0000', '') THEN '9999' ELSE B.ECCHTO END AS INT) AS ECCHTO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ECAATO IN ( '0000', '') THEN '9999' ELSE B.ECAATO END AS INT) AS ECAATO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ECBBTO IN ( '0000', '') THEN '9999' ELSE B.ECBBTO END AS INT) AS ECBBTO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ECEETO IN ( '0000', '') THEN '9999' ELSE B.ECEETO END AS INT) AS ECEETO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ECJJTO IN ( '0000', '') THEN '9999' ELSE B.ECJJTO END AS INT) AS ECJJTO ,CAST(CASE WHEN B.ECHHTO IN ( '0000', '') THEN '9999' ELSE B.ECHHTO END AS INT) AS ECHHTO
FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT071 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT073 B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.DEPT = A.DEPT AND B.GJAHR = A.GJAHR AND B.ITEM = A.ITEM WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.DEPT = #DEPT# AND A.GJAHR = #GJAHR# AND (REPLACE(A.STYM, '000000', '') = '' OR A.STYM > SUBSTR(CAST(HEX(DATE(SUBSTR(#RSLTYM#, 1, 4)||'-'||SUBSTR(#RSLTYM#, 5, 2)||'-'||'01') - 12 MONTHS) AS VARCHAR(8)), 1, 6) ) ORDER BY A.ITEM, B.MATNR WITH UR
